Comment.value:
Class Customizations:

Legendary DC Bonus: 
Every four levels over 40 Sorcerers receive a +1 to their spell DCs to a maximum of +5.

Epic Spell Progressions: 
Sorcerers now receive a bonus spell slot to all spell levels for 4 epic levels.
